data.head: https://akmweb.youngjoygame.com/web/svnres/img/mlbb/homepage/100_57eeea6d5bd8d21229de8df79751db9f.png

skilllist.skilldesc: <font color="a6aafb">Astral Spheres</font> summoned by Novaria will continuously slow nearby enemies by 20% and grant vision of them.

Novaria summons an <font color="a6aafb">Astral Sphere</font> at the target location, continuously dealing 75<font color="62f8fe"> (+25% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to nearby enemies. After 2s, the sphere will explode, dealing <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> equal to 260<font color="62f8fe"> (+50% Total Magic Power)</font> plus 4% of the enemy's Max HP to nearby enemies, and increasing <font color="a6aafb">Astral Sphere's</font> slow effect to 2.5 times the original slow effect.

Novaria summons an <font color="a6aafb">Astral Sphere</font> at a distance and draws it towards her. At the same time, Novaria gains 20% Movement Speed and can pass through terrain. Passing through a wall will increase the Movement Speed bonus to 60%.

When the <font color="a6aafb">Astral Sphere</font> reaches Novaria, she can cast <font color="a6aafb">Star Shatter</font> to launch it in a target direction within 5s. The sphere will explode when hitting an enemy hero, dealing <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> equal to 230<font color="62f8fe"> (+70% Total Magic Power)</font> plus 4% of the target's Max HP. The damage will increase based on the <font color="a6aafb">Astral Sphere's</font> travel distance (starting from when the sphere is summoned), up to 2.5 times the original damage.

Novaria scatters <font color="a6aafb">Astral Echo</font> in the target direction, briefly slowing enemy heroes hit by 50% while applying <font color="a6aafb">Astral Ring</font> on them, increasing their hitbox by 2.5 times and revealing their surrounding area. This effect lasts 5s.

data.name: Novaria
data.story: The young girl who seeks to rebuild the Star Atlas in order to solve the secrets of the Stars.

assist.desc: Novaria works well with other long-range heroes like Beatrix and Layla because her Ultimate makes any target a sitting duck for her team to pick off.

strong.desc: Novaria counters Mages with shorter range and low mobility, such as Eudora and Odette, because these heroes can't reach Novaria while Novaria can hit them with her 2nd Skill.

weak.desc: Novaria is countered by Assassins with strong targeted burst damage, such as Saber and Hayabusa, because they can easily close in on Novaria and burst her down.
